name: In re ESTATE of John C. BOWSER, Deceased, late of Pine Township, Armstrong County, Pennsylvania. Appeal of Margaret TATSAK, Executrix of the Estate of John C. Bowser, Deceased

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY and MANDERINO, JJ.
NIX, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: In re ESTATE of John C. BOWSER, Deceased, late of Pine Township, Armstrong County, Pennsylvania. Appeal of Margaret TATSAK, Executrix of the Estate of John C. Bowser, Deceased.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Decree of the court below is vacated and the matter is remanded to the court below for the purpose of holding an evidentiary hearing to determine (1) the contents of the signature card which opened a savings account in the names of the decedent and Margaret Tatsak in the Armstrong County Trust Company, Kittanning, Pennsylvania, on July 17, 1973, and (2) to permit evidence, if any there be, of what took place at or before the opening of this joint savings account.
NIX, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: James G. Callas, Callas & Graff, Kittanning, for appellant.
Blair F. Green, Kittanning, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
367 A.2d 1088
In re ESTATE of John C. BOWSER, Deceased, late of Pine Township, Armstrong County, Pennsylvania. Appeal of Margaret TATSAK, Executrix of the Estate of John C. Bowser, Deceased.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 21, 1976.
Decided Jan. 28, 1977.
James G. Callas, Callas & Graff, Kittanning, for appellant.
Blair F. Green, Kittanning, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY and MANDERINO, JJ.
